All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
availablePlacementsMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client during the player's turn.
BackSide
This class represents the backside of a PlayableCard.
cannotRejoinMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the player, who is trying to rejoin a loaded game, has input a nickname already chosen in the meantime by someone else.
Card
This class represents a card.
CardPrinter
The class that prints the cards in the TUI
CardSide
This class represents the side of a Card.
CardType
This enumeration class represents the different types of the playable cards.
Chat
This class represents the chat of the game.
checkFirstMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client periodically when the player is waiting for the first one to set up the game.
ClientInterface
 
ConnectionType
Enum class that defines the different types of connections.
Corner
This class represents a corner of a CardSide.
Deck
A class that represents a deck of Cards.
DeployedController
Controller of the deployed Pane in the center of the screen.
DeployedPrinter
Class to print the deployed cards in the TUI
EndGameController
 
endGameMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the game is over.
FirstLobbyController
 
firstPlayerMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client of the first player entering the game.
forEachCoveredCorner
This class represents the rule present in some gold CardSides.
forEachDiagonalPattern
This class represents the rule present in some ObjectiveCards.
forEachLPattern
This class represents the rule present in some ObjectiveCards.
forEachResourceSet
This class represents the rule present in some ObjectiveCards.
Game
The class that represents a game.
GameController
 
gameInfoMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the game state has changed.
GameSceneController
This class is the controller of the game scene and controls every section of the game scene.
GameServer
Class that unifies the RMI and Socket servers and runs both.
GeneralLobbyController
Controller for the lobby window dedicated to all the players wanting to join after the first one.
generalPlayerMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when a player, that is not the first, joins the game.
GoldFrontSide
This class represents the front side of a gold PlayableCard.
GUI
 
Handler
A class that handles the communication between the SocketServer and a SocketClient.
Heartbeat
This class is used to send a heartbeat message to the server every 1 second.
HeartbeatTask
This class is used to send heartbeat messages to the server.
InHandController
 
initialGameInfoMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the game starts.
InitialSceneController
 
initialSituation
This message is sent from the server to the client at the start of the game.
Kingdom
This enumeration class represents the different Kingdoms of the cards.
MainClient
 
MainServer
 
Message
A class that represents a message exchangeable between the client and the server through Socket connection.
MessageType
Enum class that defines the different types of messages.
newInHandMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the turn has finished to update the player's hand.
nickOrColorAlreadyUsedMsg
 
ObjectiveCard
This class represents an objective card, either owned by a Player as secret objective or as a common objective for all the players of the game.
ObjectivesController
 
OnGroundController
 
PawnColor
This enumeration class represents all the possible colors of the Player's pawns.
personalObjectivesMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the player has to pick its secret objective.
placeableCardsMsg
 
PlayableCard
This class represents a Card that can be played by a Player during a turn.
Player
This class represents a player in the game.
PointsRule
This interface is used to compute points, awarded to a Player, if he/she places a CardSide.
privateChatMessageMsg
This message is exchanged between server and client when a player sends a private message to someone else.
publicChatMessageMsg
This message is exchanged between server and client when a player sends a public message to all the others.
RejoinLobbyController
This controller manages the lobby for the loading of a previous game.
rejoinPlayerMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when a player wants to rejoin a loaded game.
requiredDataMsg
This message is sent from the server to the client when the game has been loaded and all the players have rejoined.
ResourceFrontSide
The front side of a PlayableCard of RESOURCE CardType.
RMIClient
 
RMIServer
 
RMIServerInterface
 
SceneController
 
SCMsgCardCouple
The message sent from the client to the server when the player has chosen the card that it wants to place and on top of which card.
SCMsgDrawPersonalObjectives
This message is sent from the client to the server when the player has chosen the side of the starting card that it wants to place and has to ask the server for two ObjectiveCards.
SCMsgFirstPlayerJoins
This message is sent from the client to the server when the first player finishes setting up the game.
SCMsgFirstStillJoining
This message is sent from the client to the server when the first player of the game is still setting up the parameters, thus all the other players connected have to wait before doing anything.
SCMsgGeneralPlayerJoins
This message is sent from the client to the server when a player that is NOT the first, wants to join the game.
SCMsgHeartbeat
The message periodically sent from the client to the server once connected, in order to detect any disconnection from the server.
SCMsgPersonalObjective
This message is sent from the client to the server when the user has picked its own secret ObjectiveCard.
SCMsgPlay
This message is sent from the client to the server when it is the turn of the player sending the message.
SCMsgPlayerRejoins
This message is sent from the client to the server when a player wants to rejoin a game that has been loaded.
SCMsgPlayTurn
This message is sent from the client to the server when the turn has finished and all the information and modifications made by the player are sent to the server.
ScoreboardController
 
simplePoints
This class represents the rule only valid for some front sides of some Resource Cards.
SocketClient
This class implements the client side of the socket connection.
SocketServer
This class represents a server that accepts new connections through TCP Sockets.
Symbol
This enumeration class represents all the symbols that Cards in the game can have.
TUI
 
View
